metadata.title: CVE-2023-24752 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libde265 v1.0.10 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference inthe ff_hevc_put_hevc_epel_pixels_8_sse function at sse-motion.cc. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-24752` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm3
libde265-examples - 1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libde265 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm3').
